texts.content: I am a Web Developer with over 5 years of experience in building dynamic applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and Laravel. I excel in enhancing user engagement through projects like SaaS migrations to WordPress and responsive React interfaces. My focus on clean coding and continuous learning ensures I deliver robust, scalable solutions. Explore my projects to see how I merge creativity with technical expertise for impactful web solutions.

items.description: Enhancing online visibility and driving traffic through effective SEO strategies and digital marketing campaigns.

items.description: Creating tailored solutions for WordPress and Shopify that cater to unique business needs.

texts.content: Developed advanced filters for project-investor matching using MySQL and Laravel, improving user experience.
Integrated Amazon SES for bulk email sending, enhancing communication with investors.
Developed RESTful APIs on Laravel for a React-based front end, enhancing interactivity.
Integrated Adsense and Google Analytics, boosting monthly ad revenue by 50%.
Transformed Figma designs into a responsive web app, increasing user engagement by 30%.
Built a CMS with Laravel, improving lead generation by 20%.
Create a Stunning, Wedding Website in Minutes with Ease and Elegance.

Create beautiful wedding websites effortlessly with our Laravel-based app. Choose from three elegant themes and customize your site with a simple, user-friendly interface. Our app uses Tailwind CSS for a sleek backend and Bootstrap with SCSS for a stylish, responsive frontend. Ideal for wedding management companies seeking a quick and easy website solution.

items.subtitle: Georgian College (Jan 2024 – Aug 2024)
items.description: Enrolled in a specialized AI and machine learning program with a focus on deep learning, NLP, LLMs, and generative AI. Working on a capstone project that uses these technologies to automate a business intelligence tool, integrating predictive analytics and data visualization with Python and TensorFlow.

items.title: Post-Graduation in Mobile Application Development
items.subtitle: Georgian College (May 2023 – Dec 2023)
items.description: Completed a post-graduation in mobile app development, specializing in Kotlin (Android), Swift (iOS), and cross-platform frameworks like React Native and Flutter. Developed apps with Node.js backend and gained proficiency in UI/UX design using Figma and Adobe XD.

items.title: Bachelor of Engineering - Computer Engineering
items.subtitle: Gujarat Technological University (2018 - 2021)
items.description: Focused on advanced topics like data structures, algorithms, system architecture, and software engineering practices. Worked on large-scale projects such as building a cloud-based inventory management system using React.js and Node.js. Participated in hackathons and coding competitions, consistently ranking among the top participants. Completed coursework on machine learning and cloud computing.

items.title: Diploma in Computer Engineering
items.subtitle: R.C. Technical Institute (2015 - 2018)
items.description: Completed a three-year program specializing in core computer engineering concepts, including software development, database management, networking, and hardware systems. Developed key projects such as a student management system using PHP and MySQL, and gained practical experience through industry exposure via workshops and seminars.
